00029 #include <inttypes.h>
00030 #include "subsystems/navigation/traffic_info.h"
00031 #include "generated/airframe.h"
00032 
00033 uint8_t acs_idx;
00034 uint8_t the_acs_id[NB_ACS_ID];
00035 struct ac_info_ the_acs[NB_ACS];
00036 
00037 void traffic_info_init( void ) {
00038   the_acs_id[0] = 0;  // ground station
00039   the_acs_id[AC_ID] = 1;
00040   the_acs[the_acs_id[AC_ID]].ac_id = AC_ID;
00041   acs_idx = 2;
00042 }
00043 
00044 struct ac_info_ * get_ac_info(uint8_t id) {
00045   return &the_acs[the_acs_id[id]];
00046 }
